column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////So glad we came for dinner here! The ambiance was beautiful
column2: staff was delightful (I forgot our great server's name... Jacky maybe?) Everything we had ordered was scrumptious. The short rib
column4: the fries (even though at first I thought they were burnt) I'm so glad Newport Beach has a location because we will definitely be going there in the meantime while we come back to Houston. Thank you guys!!
